<a id="class_TileMapPattern"></a>

# TileMapPattern

**Inherits:** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Holds a pattern to be copied from or pasted into [TileMap](class_tilemap.md)\ s.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This resource holds a set of cells to help bulk manipulations of [TileMap](class_tilemap.md).

A pattern always starts at the ``(0, 0)`` coordinates and cannot have cells with negative coordinates.
